name: Silent Night (itch) (Silent Night)
description:
Story

you walk across the woods where you work when you suddenly hear a loud crash and see smoke coming from the north side of the park. it is the sleigh of Santa. when you want to go inside the woods you get grabbed by the leg its a dying elf. he wants you to save santa before its to late.....

Controls

Left mouse button - Pick Up

Shift - Run

Ctrl - Crouch

W/S - Up/Down

A/D - Left/Right
